titleStmt.title: A physical dictionary in which all the terms relating either to anatomy, chirurgery, pharmacy, or chymistry are very accurately explain'd / by Stephen Blancard ...
titleStmt.author: Blankaart, Steven, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. and are to be sold by Samuel Crouch in Popes-head-Alley, and John Gellibrand at the Golden-Ball in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Item at 1223:2 is variant of Wing item B3164.
Reproduction of originals in the Emmanuel College Library, Cambridge University and the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: the Golden-Ball in St. Paul's Church-yard
